name: R4_v2_0179_for_R5
title: Cross-version VS for R4.v2.0179 for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0179|2.9 for use in FHIR R5. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R4 to R5.

concept.display: Always.  All MFA segments (whether denoting errors or not) must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment message
Error/Reject conditions only.  Only MFA segments denoting errors must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
Success.  Only MFA segments denoting success must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message

contains.display: Always.  All MFA segments (whether denoting errors or not) must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment message
Error/Reject conditions only.  Only MFA segments denoting errors must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
Success.  Only MFA segments denoting success must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
